short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A browser action with a popup dump of all devices signed into the same account as the current profile.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
If you're signed into an account on multiple devices and would like a list of all the profiles that are currently online with yours, this is where it's at! Simply load up Chrome (or whatever browser). 

From here just look for "My Devices." You'll be given access not only those computers but also any smartphones or tablets using your Google Account as well--so long as they have been authorized by their own user name settings before attempting logging in too.

Please contact us if you have any questions or concerns about our extension.
https://apkindus.com/
